mapper.select: SELECT eq.question_id FROM exam_question eq JOIN question q ON q.id = eq.question_id WHERE eq.exam_id = #{examId} AND eq.is_deleted = 0 AND q.is_deleted = 0 AND q.question_type = 5 -- 主观题 ORDER BY eq.sort ASC

SELECT id, exam_id AS examId, question_id AS questionId, score, sort, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM exam_question WHERE exam_id = #{examId} AND question_id = #{questionId} AND (is_deleted = 0 OR is_deleted IS NULL) LIMIT 1
